column5: Hit the big water with Iceguy this morning. It was a lovely morning to try and find some Salmon.  Fishing was slow, with only this wanna-be teenager cooperating. Taken off the rigger 40/80.  Neither the dipsey nor the core moved an inch.  :-)
Good day anyway.  Beats sitting infront of the 'ol 'puter.  Thanks for sharing.  reefrunner
Nice fish and better then nothing. What part of the lake where you fishing?  Thanks for the report.  Mike
Launced out of Dalhousie, fish was taken heading towards the Welland Canal.
Better than being at work.. athough the reason I skipped work was to get my king fix which I didn't get.:-(
I think it was that darn rusty Torpedo diver - spooking the Kings! I am not about to sell the riggers...repeat, not selling the riggers!!!
LOL... kinda what I figured !  You got out.. that's the main thing. It was great day to be on the water... we flogged GBay for 8 hours today too.

Ran the Torpedo off the church board - pulled pretty hard (Musky Torpedo) due to the weight of the diver (9.5oz), not the resistance. They will get a spot in the rotation as I will use them as an alternative to the core and the copper off the boards, maybe down the chute as well.
we went 3 for 4 tnoight off weller. Do i need to get you guys back ont the reelhard and show you what catches fish?
Anysize Bowen? What did you catch the fish on Reelhard.net ?
Good work Bowen! All Rob kept talking about was your troll master....and beads.
beads took most fish. one was near 20 but not quite other 2 were teens and one that was an inch bigger than the spoon. Shallower than before 30-40 zone spoons riggers.
We tried near where we were for the scotty. Rans spoons in same spots just couldn't hook up. We ran the rusty beads all morning.

I have to ask what your talking about when you mention beads? Is this some new rigging, or is it just a nickname for something else? Never heard of that before......I don't do any great lakes trolling either.....just from charter boats.  If its a secret, I won't tell anyone, I promise  Sinker

Just spit coffee all over my keyboard - that is damn funny!     It's a bit of a joke as one day I was busy spilling the beads used for the slide diver all over the boat...the dialogue deteriorated from there....
